product: Athletic shoes athletic apparel sporting goods accessories
description: Nike, Inc. [ note 1 ] (stylized as NIKE ) is an American athletic footwear and apparel corporation headquartered near Beaverton, Oregon . [ 6 ] It is the world's largest supplier of athletic shoes and apparel and a major manufacturer of sports equipment , with revenue in excess of US$46 billion in its fiscal year 2022. [ 7 ] [ 8 ]
